content: a sweet colourwork cup cosy with two colourwork variations perfect for spring and easter knit in any dk yarn this yarnsmiths pebble haze is beautifully soft and fluffy it would work perfectly with a variegated yarn as well **finished size** measures 13cms wide when laid flat designed to fit a travel mug or cup measuring 24-26cms in circumference **gauge** 19 stitches per 10cms when knitted in colourwork pattern on 4mm needles **version** 1 easter eggs with ribbing 3 5mm circular needle/dpns 4mm circular needle/dpns mc 7g yarnsmiths pebble haze dk limestone 2c050 cc 5g yarnsmiths pebble haze dk saltburn 2d100 darning needle **version 2** bunnies with gap for a mug handle 4mm needles mc 7g yarnsmiths pebble haze dk limestone 2c050 cc 5g yarnsmiths pebble haze dk lulworth 2d090 darning needle
